CustomField.description: The value used to match if using RBAC Category and the RBACFeatureResolver. Can be a comma-delimited string of appropriate values. If values exceeds 255 characters, consider a different mechanism for giving access to a feature, such as using a single custom permission.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The value used to match if using RBAC Category and the RBACFeatureResolver. Can be a comma-delimited string of appropriate values. If values exceeds 255 characters, consider a different mechanism for giving access to a feature, such as using a single custom permission.
CustomField.label: RBAC Category Value
